hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
echo $LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR export BOOST_DIR="/mnt/nfs/TOOLS/boost-1.53.0" export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=27000@192.168.163.60 export VECTORCAST_DIR=${LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR} export PYTHONPATH=/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:PYTHONPATH
ulimit -c unlimited
#function to handle error handle_error() { export _error_=$? if [ ! "$_error_" == "0" ];then echo " Command failed " export _RETURN_CODE_=$_error_ fi }
#Print tools version in console for reference $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast --version
#Copy the firefox source #cp -r /home/vectorindia/firefox_regression/* $WORKSPACE/.
#. ./make_config
#print date echo $(date) >>$summary_file >>sol.txt
#print VcTools version in log file echo "---- Results for VcTools Version : ` $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version | grep Version | awk '{print $3}'` " >> $summary_file echo "---- Results for VcTools Version : ` $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version | grep Version | awk '{print $3}'` " >> sol.txt echo >> $summary_file
#tabular format for the file echo -e "Command Time ExpectedTime Artifact ExpectedArtifact TimmingResult ArtiResult " >>$summary_file echo -e "Command Time ExpectedTime Artifact ExpectedArtifact TimmingResult ArtiResult " >>sol.txt
#Execute and measure timings for vcshell make -j8 #echo -n -e "VchellMake-j4 \t">>$summary_file #time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --db=pristine_vcshell.db make -j4 >vcshell_make.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcshell_make.out || handle_error #Extract vcshell_make.out $vcshelltime `expr $vcshelltime + 6` || handle_error
#cp pristine_vcshell.db vcshell.db
#$VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getfiles > files
cd $WORKSPACE/mozilla-release/obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
#taking 1000 files head -1000 files > first1k.txt || handle_error echo -n -e "typeinfo_first1k\t">>$summary_file || handle_error time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --filelist=first1k.txt --jobs=4 addtypeinfo > typeinfo1.out 2>&1) 2>> typeinfo1 || handle_error
exit
#next 1000 files sed -n -e '1001,2000p' files > second1k.txt || handle_error echo -n -e "typeinfo_second1k\t">>$summary_file || handle_error time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --filelist=second1k.txt --jobs=4 addtypeinfo > typeinfo2.out 2>&1) 2>> typeinfo2 || handle_error
#next 1000 files sed -n -e '2001,3000p' files > third1k.txt || handle_error echo -n -e "typeinfo_third1k\t">>$summary_file || handle_error time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --filelist=third1k.txt --jobs=4 addtypeinfo > typeinfo3.out 2>&1) 2>> typeinfo3 || handle_error
#next 1000 files sed -n -e '3001,4000p' files > fourth1k.txt || handle_error echo -n -e "typeinfo_fourth1k\t">>$summary_file || handle_error time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --filelist=fourth1k.txt --jobs=4 addtypeinfo > typeinfo4.out 2>&1) 2>> typeinfo4 || handle_error
#next 1000 files sed -n -e '4001,5085p' files > fifth1k.txt || handle_error echo -n -e "typeinfo_fifth\t">>$summary_file || handle_error time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --filelist=fifth1k.txt --jobs=4 addtypeinfo > typeinfo5.out 2>&1) 2>> typeinfo5 || handle_error
(column -t $summary_file) > temp.txt || handle_error rm -rf $summary_file || handle_error cp temp.txt $summary_file || handle_error
exit /b $_RETURN_CODE_
